# Published Articles

This section lists all peer-reviewed publications resulting from research funded by this grant.

## Journal Articles

1. Smith J, Johnson R, Williams S. (2023). Developmental trajectories of cognitive control networks in typically developing children. *Journal of Cognitive Neuroscience*, 35(4), 598-612. PMCID: PMC8765432.

2. Johnson R, Anderson K, Smith J. (2023). Neural signatures of response inhibition in children with ADHD: A multimodal neuroimaging study. *Biological Psychiatry: Cognitive Neuroscience and Neuroimaging*, 8(3), 275-288. PMCID: PMC8723456.

3. Williams S, Smith J, Bessette K. (2022). Altered functional connectivity during cognitive control in autism spectrum disorder. *Autism Research*, 15(6), 1024-1038. PMCID: PMC8654321.

## Book Chapters

1. Smith J, Williams S. (2023). Neural mechanisms of cognitive control in neurodevelopmental disorders. In M. Johnson & N. Thompson (Eds.), *Handbook of Developmental Cognitive Neuroscience* (pp. 213-235). Oxford University Press.

## Conference Proceedings

1. Johnson R, Smith J, Williams S. (2023). Machine learning approaches for classifying ADHD and ASD based on neural signatures of cognitive control. *Proceedings of the International Conference on Machine Learning in Healthcare*, 245-253.

# Presentations

This section lists all conference presentations and invited talks related to this grant.

## Invited Talks

2. Smith J. (2023, February). *Multimodal neuroimaging approaches to studying cognitive control*. Invited departmental colloquium at Stanford University, Stanford, CA.

### 2023

1. Johnson R, Smith J. (2023, May). *Disorder-specific neural signatures in ADHD and ASD*. Poster presented at the International Society for Autism Research Annual Meeting, Stockholm, Sweden.

2. Williams S, Anderson K, Smith J. (2023, March). *Computational modeling of cognitive control performance based on neural network dynamics*. Poster presented at the Cognitive Neuroscience Society Annual Meeting, San Francisco, CA.

2. Bessette K, Williams S, Smith J. (2022, September). *Predicting individual differences in cognitive control performance using machine learning approaches*. Poster presented at the American Academy of Child and Adolescent Psychiatry Annual Meeting, Toronto, Canada.

# Acknowledgments {.unnumbered}

All publications and presentations include the following acknowledgment:

"This research was supported by the National Institute of Mental Health (Grant #XXXXXXX to J. Smith)."

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| fig.height: 6
#| fig.width: 8
#| fig.cap: "Publication timeline by type"

# Load required libraries
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(tidyverse)
  library(lubridate)
})

# Create publication data
publications <- tibble(
  title = c(
    "Altered functional connectivity during cognitive control in autism spectrum disorder",
    "Developmental trajectories of cognitive control networks in typically developing children",
    "Neural signatures of response inhibition in children with ADHD: A multimodal neuroimaging study",
    "Neural mechanisms of cognitive control in neurodevelopmental disorders",
    "Machine learning approaches for classifying ADHD and ASD based on neural signatures of cognitive control"
  ),
  type = c(
    "Journal Article",
    "Journal Article",
    "Journal Article",
    "Book Chapter",
    "Conference Proceeding"
  ),
  date = c(
    "2022-09-15",
    "2023-01-20",
    "2023-03-12",
    "2023-05-30",
    "2023-07-15"
  ),
  journal = c(
    "Autism Research",
    "Journal of Cognitive Neuroscience",
    "Biological Psychiatry: CNNI",
    "Handbook of Developmental Cognitive Neuroscience",
    "Proceedings of ICMLH"
  )
) %>%
  mutate(date = as.Date(date),
         month = floor_date(date, "month"))

# Create publication timeline
ggplot(publications, aes(x = date, y = reorder(type, desc(type)), color = type)) +
  geom_point(size = 4, alpha = 0.7) +
  geom_text(aes(label = journal), hjust = -0.1, size = 3, fontface = "italic") +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1") +
  scale_x_date(date_breaks = "3 months", date_labels = "%b %Y",
               limits = c(as.Date("2022-07-01"), as.Date("2023-09-01"))) +
  labs(title = "Publications Timeline",
       subtitle = "Publications resulting from grant research",
       x = NULL, y = NULL) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_text(size = 11, face = "bold"))
